name: FNF - Vs. Lune Full Week
description:
"You have been challenged by.. a Runerigus?"

'VS Lune' is a FNF full week mod for FNF. 
This mod was built and compiled from source with tears and a lot of 'null object reference' to bring you a smooth funkin experience with your very opponent, Lune!

Featuring:

- A full week rap battle against Lune! (do I have to repeat this?)

- 3 Custom Songs ('Ingvar Ingmar', 'What Yer Offer', 'Deathburn')

- Custom Logo.. Custom Sprites.. Custom Dialogue.. Custom Background.. Oh my!

Will you.. uh, avoid blue-balling yourself and defeat him? Well, one way to find out, download now!
